__e: So, in the spirit of friendship, we welcome you to Deep Space 9 and wish you success in the creation of the galaxy's first artificial wormhole.
I picked up a lead on the Ravinok.
As the Commanding Officer of the Defiant it was my duty to look forward to anticipate every possible situation.
Major, I know what happened to Commander Sisko and the others.
The Ferengi Shuttle Quark's Treasure has just departed the station.
But we don't know where in time Sisko and the others are.
